titles.title: Historic Greenwood District—Black Wall Street National Monument Establishment Act
Historic Greenwood District—Black Wall Street National Monument Establishment Act
Historic Greenwood District—Black Wall Street National Monument Establishment Act
A bill to establish the Historic Greenwood District-Black Wall Street National Monument in the State of Oklahoma, and for other purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.
Senate Committee on Energy and Natural Resources discharged by Unanimous Consent.

vote.text: Passed Senate without amendment by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Message on Senate action sent to the House.
